This document describes our policy related to the gathering and disseminating of information obtained from users of our services. This Privacy Policy applies to Goodwill Industries\xAE Sacramento Valley & Northern Nevada\u2019s hard copy publications and its web site located at www.goodwillsacto.org (\u201CSite\u201D or \u201CWeb Site\u201D). The policy relates to information we collect, including personally identifiable information as well as information that does not identify donors and Web Site users personally.
